import React, { useState, Fragment } from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { Link,withRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Header, Form, Button ,Input,Icon} from 'semantic-ui-react'; import {createProfile} from '../../action/profileAction'; const CreateProfile = ({createProfile,history}) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ company: '', website: '', location:'', status: '', skills: '', githubusername: '', bio: '', twitter: '', facebook: '', linkedin: '', youtube: '', instagram: '' }); const [displaySocilaInputs,toggleSocialInputs] = useState({display:false}); const { company, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube, instagram } = formData; const onChange = (e) =>{ setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(formData); createProfile(formData,history) } return (
Create Your Profile
Let's get some information to make your profile stand out
* = required field
Give us an idea of where you are at in your career Give us an idea of where you are at in your career Give us an idea of where you are at in your career Give us an idea of where you are at in your career Give us an idea of where you are at in your career {displaySocilaInputs.display && ( {/* */} ) }
); }; export default connect(null,{createProfile})(withRouter(CreateProfile));
